topics.body:
Episode 9 impressions

------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[spoiler]Konata be like "UGH KNOWLEDGE"

everyone be like "UGH STUDYING"

yep, all these type O traits definitely describe me >_>

"DON'T BE DISSIN' THE GINGER"

CAAAAAKE

TOO MUCH CAAAAAAAAKE

I do love me some minesweeper and solitaire though. Screw you Konata they're games to me :P

eyedrops are terrifying

"you sound like a nerdy turtle" and people hate this dub why? it's hilarious XD

ASHTRAY ATTACK

"it's a good thing for an idol to keep a few of these props handy!" "where?" hammerspace, of course

I actually know the answer to that infinite lives question at the end, the game won't read anything over 128, so it loops back around to the negative integers. Thus you have negative lives. You ded.[/spoiler]

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
